title: Two men caught performing sex acts on each other in the middle of a shopping centre toilet at 6pm
text:
Opinion 'CHILDREN COULD HAVE SEEN THEM' Two men caught performing sex acts on each other in the middle of a shopping centre toilet at 6pm 
Thomas Smurthwaite and Marc Stamp were spotted b y the horrified manager in front of the urinals in the mens' toilets By GEMMA MULLIN Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments TWO men were caught performing sex acts on each other in the middle of a shopping centre toilet at 6pm. 
Thomas Smurthwaite and Marc Stamp were spotted b y the horrified manager in front of the urinals in the mens’ toilets in Eldon Garden Shopping Centre in Newcastle. ncjMedia 2 Marc Stamp, 33, pictured leaving Newcastle magistrates court, was caught engaging in a sex act with Thomas Smurthwaite in a shopping centre 
The court heard the offence happened on a traditional late-night shopping day when there was the potential a child could have walked in. 
Smurthwaite, 23, of Stanley, and Stamp, 33, of Coulby Newham, pleaded guilty to one charge each of engaging in sexual activity in a publicly lavatory when they appeared at Newcastle magistrates’ court. 
Lee Poppett, prosecuting, said the offence happened on Newcastle’s traditional late-night shopping day on Thursday, January 12, when there was a potential children could have walked in. 
He said: “It’s blatant behaviour at 6pm in the evening. 
“It’s in full view of the main area of the mens’ lavatories, in front of the urinals. It’s not an allegation that was contained in a cubicle.” RELATED STORIES 'HE CAUSED ME SHAME AND DISGUST' Council boss jailed after forcing cash-strapped teens into sex acts in exchange for money PAEDO COP Met police officer forced 14-year-old girls to carry out sick sex acts while he watched over Skype REALITY STAR REVENGE PORN Builder dodges jail after he twice posted explicit sex act pic of Ex On the Beach star Aimee Kimber on Twitter 'for banter' Sexy Time This is the day of the week and the exact time that people are most likely to be having sex 'Had so much fun at court today' Woman films sex act in courthouse, boasting 'found a way to get my charges dropped' 
Mr Poppett added: “At around 6pm, a witness who is employed as a manager at Eldon Garden say he observed Smurthwaite walking into the male toilets on the ground-floor. 
“He says there has been suspicious activity by Smurthwaite in the past and he waits outside the toilets for a moment or two before entering. 
“He saw Smurthwaite and Stamp about a foot away from each other.” 
The court was told the manager immediately released what the pair were doing and contacted police. 
Mr Poppett said: “By 6.25pm, the police had been called and had arrived. ncjMedia Thomas Smurthwaite, pictured leaving court, admitted the offence and was fined for performing a sex act in the communal area of public toilets 
“Smurthwaite and Stamp were then transported to Forth Banks Police Station. 
“Both were compliant and made full admissions. Both are of previous good character. Stamp does have one previous caution.” 
Andrew O’Hanlon, defending, said both men were remorseful. 
“They have been full co-operative with the police and they’re mortified of having this happen to them – they’re both extremely upset. 
“There’s no way they will get into this sort of trouble again. It will definitely not happen again.” 
Stamp, who is employed, was fined £180 and was ordered to pay £50 costs and a £30 victim surcharge, while Smurthwaite, who is unemployed, was fined £120 and ordered to pay the same costs and surcharge.
